messages.ADD_ELEMENTS: Add a Node, Link, Facility or Doorway
messages.SHIFT_NODE_CLICK: Click two Nodes with holding "Shift" key
messages.DFGH_CLICK: Click map with holding "D","F","G" or "H" key
messages.SHIFT_POI_CLICK: Click Node and Facility with holding "Shift" key
messages.ADD_VERTEX: Add: Click link with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.DEL_VERTEX: Delete: Click vertex with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.OPT_CLICK: Click a node of link with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.OPT_CLICK2: Click a connection node with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.SPLIT_LINK: Insert a link on a straight link
messages.SPLIT_LINK1: Click a straight link with holding "S" key
messages.COPY_POI1: Click a Facility with holding "C" key
messages.EDIT_ELEVATOR1: Link automatically snapped when connected nodes approaches to other
messages.EDIT_ELEVATOR2: Drag connected node with holding "Shift" key to resume snap
messages.ALIGN_LINKS: Align links in a straight line

lat.name: Latitude
lat.desc: Latitude of the center position. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g.,35.6755310).

lon.name: Longitude
lon.desc: Longitude of the center position. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g.,139.7512700).

floor.name: Floor number
floor.desc: Floor number (A location between floors shall be expressed with a decimal point such as "1.5." Above-ground outdoors shall be "0.")

in_out.name: Facility in/out classification
in_out.desc: 1: out of the facility, 2: in/out boundary of the facility, 3: in the facility

link#_id.name: Connected link ID
link#_id.desc: Enter the ID of a link to be connected (Enter multiple link IDs to connect multiple links.)

distance.name: Link length
distance.desc: Enter a link length up to the first decimal place (in meters). (No need to enter this item if the route type is an elevator.)

rt_struct.name: Route structure
rt_struct.desc: 1: physical separation provided between roadways and sidewalks, 2: no physical separation provided between roadways and sidewalks, 3: pedestrian crossing, 4: road crossing without road marking for pedestrian crossing, 5: underpass, 6: pedestrian crossing bridge, 7: passage in facility, 8: other route structure, 99: unknown

route_type.name: Route type
route_type.desc: 1: no corresponding attribute information, 2: moving walkway, 3: railroad crossing, 4: elevator, 5: escalator, 6: stairs, 7: slope, 99: unknown

direction.name: Direction
direction.desc: 1: both directions, 2: direction from source to target, 3: direction from target to source, 99: unknown

width.name: Width
width.desc: 1: less than 1.0 m, 2: 1.0 m to less than 2.0 m, 3: 2.0 m to less than 3.0 m, 4: 3.0 m or more, 99: unknown

vtcl_slope.name: Gradient
vtcl_slope.desc: 1: 5% or less, 2: more than 5% (target higher than source), 3: more than 5% (target lower than source), 99: unknown

lev_diff.name: Step
lev_diff.desc: 1: 2 cm or less, 2: more than 2 cm, 99: unknown

tfc_signal.name: Signals for pedestrians
tfc_signal.desc: 1: without signals for pedestrians, 2: with pedestrian-vehicle separated signals, 3: with pedestrian-control signals, 4: other signals than these, 99: unknown

tfc_s_type.name: Types of signals for pedestrians
tfc_s_type.desc: 1: without sound equipment, 2: with sound equipment (without a button for visually impaired person), 3: with sound equipment (with a button for visually impaired person), 99: unknown

brail_tile.name: Tactile walking surface indicators
brail_tile.desc: 1: without tactile walking surface indicators, etc., 2: with tactile walking surface indicators, etc., 99: unknown

elevator.name: Elevator type
elevator.desc: 1: without elevator, 2: with elevator (not accessible), 3: with elevator (accessible to wheelchair users), 4: with elevator (accessible to visually impaired persons), 5: with elevator (accessible to wheelchair users and visually impaired persons), 99: unknown

start_time.name: Service start time
start_time.desc: Enter service start time if the service time is limited. Leave this field blank if the service time is not limited. Enter "99" if it is unknown. The format is "HHMM."

end_time.name: Service end time
end_time.desc: Enter service end time if the service time is limited. Leave this field blank if the service time is not limited. Enter "99" if it is unknown. The format is "HHMM."

start_date.name: Service start date
start_date.desc: Enter a service start date if network data is to be developed before the services start of a road or passage. Leave this field blank if the road is already in service. Enter "99" if it is unknown. The format is "YYYY-MM-DD."

end_date.name: Service end date
end_date.desc: Enter a service end date if the service end of a road or passage is planned. Leave this field blank if the service end is not planned. Enter "99" if it is unknown. The format is "YYYY-MM-DD."

no_serv_d.name: Service closing days
no_serv_d.desc: Enter non-service days if the service days of the week are limited. Omitted if the service days of the week are not limited. Convert the days of the week into numbers (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) and enter numbers consecutively in an ascending order if there are more than one. Leave this field blank if there is no service closing day. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

tfc_restr.name: Restricted traffic
tfc_restr.desc: 1: freely accessible, 2: access undesirable (private space), 3: fare payment required, 99: unknown

w_min.name: Minimum width
w_min.desc: Enter the minimum width in a link up to the first decimal place (in meters).

w_min_lat.name: Latitude at minimum width
w_min_lat.desc: Latitude of a point at the minimum width. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

w_min_lon.name: Longitude at minimum width
w_min_lon.desc: Longitude of a point at the minimum width. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

vSlope_max.name: Maximum gradient
vSlope_max.desc: Enter the maximum gradient in a link as an integer (in percent).

vSlope_lat.name: Gradient latitude
vSlope_lat.desc: Latitude of a point at the maximum gradient in a link. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

vSlope_lon.name: Gradient longitude
vSlope_lon.desc: Longitude of a point at the maximum gradient in a link. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

hSlope_max.name: Maximum crossfall
hSlope_max.desc: Enter the maximum gradient in a link as an integer (in percent).

hSlope_lat.name: Crossfall latitude
hSlope_lat.desc: Latitude of a point at the maximum crossfall in a link. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

hSlope_lon.name: Crossfall longitude
hSlope_lon.desc: Longitude of a point at the maximum crossfall in a link. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

condition.name: Road surface condition
condition.desc: 1: no problem in wheelchair accessibility, 2: problem in wheelchair accessibility, 99: unknown

levDif_max.name: Maximum step height
levDif_max.desc: Enter the maximum step height in a link as an integer (in centimeters).

levDif_lat.name: Step latitude
levDif_lat.desc: Latitude of a point at the maximum step height in a link. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

levDif_lon.name: Step longitude
levDif_lon.desc: Longitude of a point at the maximum step height in a link. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

stair.name: Number of steps of stairs
stair.desc: Enter a number of steps as an integer.

handrail.name: Handrail
handrail.desc: 1: none, 2: on the right, 3: on the left, 4: on both sides, 99: unknown (The direction is as seen from the source.)

bus_s_lat.name: Latitude of a bus stop
bus_s_lat.desc: Latitude of a bus stop in a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

bus_s_lon.name: Longitude of a bus stop
bus_s_lon.desc: Longitude of a bus stop in a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

facility.name: Support equipment
facility.desc: 1: none, 2: accessible escalator for wheelchair, 3: stair lift, 4: step lift, 5: audio guidance device, 6: other support equipment, 99: unknown (Equipment requiring human intervention is excluded.)

facil_lat.name: Latitude of support equipment
facil_lat.desc: Latitude of support equipment in a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

facil_lon.name: Longitude of support equipment
facil_lon.desc: Longitude of support equipment in a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

elev_lat.name: Latitude of an elevator
elev_lat.desc: Latitude of an elevator in a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

elev_lon.name: Longitude of an elevator
elev_lon.desc: Longitude of an elevator in a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

door_type.name: Door type
door_type.desc: 1: none, 2: automatic door, 3: press-button automatic door, 4: manual sliding door, 5: manual door, 6: revolving door, 7: other door, 99: unknown

tfc_s_lat.name: Latitude of a traffic signal
tfc_s_lat.desc: Latitude of a traffic signal near a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

tfc_s_lon.name: Longitude of a traffic signal
tfc_s_lon.desc: Longitude of a traffic signal near a link if any. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

day_trfc.name: Daily traffic
day_trfc.desc: Enter a daily traffic as an integer (Enter a value only for a census target section. Do not enter a value for a non-target section.)

st_name.name: Name of a street or an intersection
st_name.desc: Enter an alias if any (Enter an intersection name if the link is on an intersection). Leave this field blank if there is no alias, etc. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

facil_type.name: Facility type
facil_type.desc: 1: public offices, etc., 2: educational and cultural facilities, etc., 3: medical facilities, 4: health and welfare facilities, 5: commercial facilities, 6: accommodations, 7: parks and athletic facilities, 8: tourist facilities, 9: transport facilities, 10: public toilets (standalone), 99: other facilities

evacuation.name: Evacuation center and area
evacuation.desc: 1: none designated, 2: designated emergency evacuation center, 3: designated evacuation center, 4: welfare evacuation site, 5: both 2 and 3, 6: both 2 and 4, 7: both 3 and 4, 8: all of 2, 3, and 4, 99: unknown

name.name: Name
name.desc: Facility name. Leave this field blank if there is no name. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

name_ja.name: Name (Japanese)
name_ja.desc: Facility name. Leave this field blank if there is no name. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

name_en.name: Name (English)
name_en.desc: Facility name in English. Leave this field blank if there is no name. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

address.name: Address
address.desc: Facility location. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

tel.name: Telephone number
tel.desc: Facility telephone number. Leave this field blank if there is no telephone number. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

lat.name: Latitude
lat.desc: Latitude of the center position. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

lon.name: Longitude
lon.desc: Longitude of the center position. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

toilet.name: Toilets
toilet.desc: 1: none, 2: general toilets, 3: multi-functional toilets (without equipment for ostomates, nor diaper change bed), 4: multi-functional toilets (with equipment for ostomates), 5: multi-functional toilets (with diaper change bed), 6: multi-functional toilets (with equipment for ostomates, and diaper change bed), 99: unknown

elevator.name: Elevators
elevator.desc: 1: without elevator, 2: with elevator (without barrier-free equipment), 3: with elevator (accessible to wheelchair users), 4: with elevator (accessible to visually impaired persons), 5: with elevator (accessible to both wheelchair users and visually impaired persons), 99: unknown

parking.name: Accessible parking
parking.desc: 1: none, 2: parking for general visitors, 3: wheelchair accessible parking, 4: both 2 and 3, 99: unknown

barrier.name: Wheelchair accessible entrance
barrier.desc: 1: none, 2: with wheelchair accessible entrance, 99: unknown (If the step at the entrance is approximately 2 cm or less or there is a slope or the entrance is judged to be accessible because there is an elevator for wheelchair users, etc., enter "2: with wheelchair accessible entrance.")

info.name: Information offices
info.desc: 1: none, 2: yes (not accessible to hearing-impaired persons), 3: yes (accessible to hearing-impaired persons), 99: unknown

info_board.name: Information board
info_board.desc: 1: none, 2: yes (not accessible to visually impaired persons), 3: yes (accessible to visually impaired persons), 99: unknown

name_hira.name: Name (hiragana)
name_hira.desc: Enter a facility name in hiragana. Leave this field blank if there is no facility name. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

fax.name: Fax number
fax.desc: Facility fax number. Leave this field blank if there is no fax number. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

mail.name: E-Mail
mail.desc: Facility e-mail address. Leave this field blank if there is no e-mail address. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

start_time.name: Service start time
start_time.desc: Enter service start time if the service time is limited. Leave this field blank if the service time is not limited. Enter "99" if it is unknown. The format is "HH-MM."

end_time.name: Service end time
end_time.desc: Enter service end time if the service time is limited. Leave this field blank if the service time is not limited. Enter "99" if it is unknown. The format is "HH-MM."

no_serv_d.name: Service closing days
no_serv_d.desc: Enter non-service days if the service days of the week are limited. Omitted if the service days of the week are not limited. Convert the days of the week into numbers (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) and enter numbers consecutively in an ascending order if there are more than one. Leave this field blank if there is no service closing day. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

subject.name: Subject of medical treatment
subject.desc: 1: internal medicine, 2: pediatrics, 3: surgery, 4: obstetrics and gynecology, 5: other, 99: unknown Enter numbers consecutively in an ascending order if there is more than one department.

close_day.name: Closing days
close_day.desc: If there are closing days, convert the closing days of the week into numbers (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) and enter numbers consecutively in an ascending order if there are more than one. (If closing days differ between hospital departments, handle them as different facilities.) Leave this field blank if there is no closing day. Enter "99" if it is unknown.

flood.name: Designated for storm and flood damage

ent#_lat.name: Latitude of entrance #
ent#_lat.desc: Latitude of the center position. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 35.6755310).

ent#_lon.name: Longitude of entrance #
ent#_lon.desc: Longitude of the center position. Enter a value in decimal notation (e.g., 139.7512700).

ent#_n.name: Name of entrance #
ent#_n.desc: Enter an entrance name (Leave this field blank if there is no entrance name. Enter "99" if it is unknown.)

ent#_w.name: Width of entrance #
ent#_w.desc: 1: less than 1.0 m, 2: 1.0 m to less than 2.0 m, 3: 2.0 m to less than 3.0 m, 4: 3.0 m or more, 99: unknown (Evaluate the minimum width in a relevant link.)

ent#_d.name: Door type of entrance #
ent#_d.desc: 1: none, 2: automatic door, 3: press-button automatic door, 4: manual sliding door, 5: manual door, 6: revolving door, 7: other door, 99: unknown

ent#_brr.name: Wheelchair accessible entrance #
ent#_brr.desc: 1: none, 2: with wheelchair accessible entrance, 99: unknown (If the step at the entrance is approximately 2 cm or less or there is a slope or the entrance is judged to be accessible because there is an elevator for wheelchair users, etc., enter "2: with wheelchair accessible entrance.")

ent#_fl.name: Floor number of entrance #
ent#_fl.desc: Enter the floor number of a node near the entrance.

hulop_area_name.desc: specify area name (building name, area name, etc.)
